name: Memore-wind
description:
Made for: Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2

Softwares used: Unity 3d 2018, Bosca Ceoil, Audacity, MS Paint, PixelLab

Controls:

A, S -> Move

Hold R -> Start Rewinding

Release R -> Stop Rewinding

How to Play:

After you start rewinding, the speed you had is restored when you stop rewinding. You have to use this mechanic to your advantage.

Start rewinding when you just hit a platform and stop it when you are high above. This will help you to jump higher and reach higher platforms.
